posts.post_content:
I have a large amount of raw t206s available for sale. 

Grades range from fair-vg/ex, most lie somewhere in between. My scans don't come out large enough on the site (see below), so I can email scans to those interested.

I have many HOFers and SLers, basically most of the set, so if you are looking for a larger lot of cards, shoot me an e-mail.

thanks - Rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks to those who have purchased cards already...hundreds remain.

email is best to reach me...

Rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

PM Sent.  

I tried to send an email but it is being rejected.  Sorry.

Thanks,
Andy
more good deals, thanks...lots of cards remain. HOF, SL, commons...
I bought my Walter Johnson and Fred Merkle portraits from Rob. I highly recommend him, everybody. He's great to do business with.
